text: mariyu vastavaniki memu varini drdhanga sthiraparaci unnamu; a vidhanga memu (o khuraisulara) mim'malni kuda sthiraparacaledu. Memu variki cevulanu, kannulanu mariyu hrdayalanu iccamu. Kani vari cevulu, kallu mariyu hrdayalu variki upayogapadaledu; endukante varu allah sucanalanu tiraskaristu undevaru mariyu varu denini gurinci parihasam cestu undevaro ade varini cuttukunnadi
